pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Optical Parameters from Spindle Stage Measurements // Calculates optical parameters of crystals like the optical axes, the axis angle 2V, and the direction of the principal axes of the indicatrix from extinction angles measured on a spindle stage mounted on a polarisation microscope stage. Details of the method can be found in Dufey (2017) arXiv:1703.00070.
